A4.text: Allegiant Stadium is an indoor multi-purpose stadium in Paradise, Nevada.

A5.text: Allegiant Stadium is located on about 62 acres of land west of Mandalay Bay at Russell Road and Hacienda Avenue, just west of Interstate 15.
